Women looking for a boyfriend is a long-term investment, and being a chicken is a short-term leverage of their body.
by lihkgson

replies.msg:
1. No matter how close the bulls and bears are to shooting, as long as they know the choices, they are still at risk.

2. Having a Beverly Hills mansion with a market value of more than 100 million yuan only means that you are wealthy; having a nano-disk in Hong Kong means that you understand the real estate market.

3. The fund managers in Berkshire Hathaway came to Hong Kong to play CBBCs and only survived for three trading days.

4. If the government forces citizens to provide MPF monthly, citizens should have the right to invest MPF in derivatives to become rich.

5. The courage to admit mistakes is superfluous, because you are just unsuccessful. Bendo wins.

6. Today he can sit in the shade because he planted a tree a long time ago. But he chose to grow trees instead of cannabis, which was an investment mistake.

7. Unemployment delays your talent for stock speculation. Unemployment is the source of continuous improvement.

8. Women looking for a boyfriend is a long-term investment, and being a chicken is a short-term leverage on their bodies.

9. If the simulated position allows you to make millions of profits, it proves that you are talented. You may wish to borrow a little. Seriously when operating the real position, you will definitely scare the market.

10. Being rich may not necessarily be happy, but at least it will make you sad to make fun of the poor.

quote.msg:
1. No matter how close the bulls and bears are to shooting, as long as they know the choices, they are still at risk.

2. Having a Beverly Hills mansion with a market value of more than 100 million yuan only means that you are wealthy; having a nano-disk in Hong Kong means that you understand the real estate market.

3. The fund managers in Berkshire Hathaway came to Hong Kong to play CBBCs and only survived for three trading days.

4. If the government forces citizens to provide MPF monthly, citizens should have the right to invest MPF in derivatives to become rich.

5. The courage to admit mistakes is superfluous, because you are just unsuccessful. Bendo wins.

6. Today he can sit in the shade because he planted a tree a long time ago. But he chose to grow trees instead of cannabis, which was an investment mistake.

7. Unemployment delays your talent for stock speculation. Unemployment is the source of continuous improvement.

8. Women looking for a boyfriend is a long-term investment, and being a chicken is a short-term leverage on their bodies.

9. If the simulated position allows you to make millions of profits, it proves that you are talented. You may wish to borrow a little. Seriously when operating the real position, you will definitely scare the market.

10. Being rich may not necessarily be happy, but at least it will make you sad to make fun of the poor.

1. No matter how close the CBBC is to knock out, if we choose right, we win. Over my dead body!
2. Owning mansions in Beverly Hill means you are rich. Owning nm flats in Hong Kong means you are the king of real estate.
3. Portfolio managers from Berkshire Hathaway cannot survive more than 3 days in Hong Kong trading CBBCs.
4. If the government coerces citizens to invest in the pension fund, then the citizens should have the right to invest the pension fund in derivatives to be rich af.
5. It is pointless to admit your mistakes, because you are just on the way to success. Don't sell your stock and rich dude eventually win!
6. Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago. However, it is a strategic mistake in investment to plant a tree but not marijuana.
7. Employment undermines your brilliance in investment. Only joblessness is the only way to constantly improve yourself.
8. For a female, looking for a boyfriend is value investing, and hooking up is short-term leverage of her physical asset.
9. If you earn millions in paper trading, it proves your talent. So go for the absolute limit in the margin, you will definitely stunt the market when you trade in reality.
10. Being rich is not necessarily happy, but at least you can mock at the poor dude with a long face.
